title: Use Me
description: As she grows from rebellious adolescent in preppy suburbs of Delaware to sexually-fraught adult in New York City, Evie Wakefield struggles to connect with the men in her life: Chas Wakefield, her larger-than-life father, who has cheated cancer for years; Billy, her sexy, responsibility-shy musician husband; and Charlie her needy young son.
author: Elissa Schappell
